column1: #Text=The Globe must be absolutely delighted with Trump's victory.
#Text=Now you have your Rob Ford on Steroids.
#Text=Nothing a paper like this enjoys more than having their favored candidate lose and conversely despise the winner; you've got so many things to look forward to in the next four years.
#Text=With a Trump victory its proof the media is out of touch and the people can come up with their own thoughts and opinions.
#Text=You tried with Ignatieff way back and its well known he was a creation of the Globe backroom.
#Text=Gives us peons something to talk about too.
